ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] UPDATE 2 - we're getting there!
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t see the one I d sent to your erols email address, so I guess I ll send it here... Talies Dance of the Dead - Party-only, Wind Instrument Targeted
ygData.messageBody:
I don't see the one I'd sent to your erols email address, so I guess I'll
send it here...

"Talies' Dance of the Dead - Party-only, Wind Instrument
Targeted player's corpse, if within range (limited to about 100 feet or so,
of course) gets up and walks to it's owner (Owner
must be within "heal" range of the Bard)"

Purpose: To assist retrieving corpses from lava, under the world, or other
inaccessible places. By making it a party-only spell, it would prevent
exploiting. By making it a very short distance, it keeps the necromancer's
spell very valuable - I mean, if your corpse is underneath Vox, what would
you rather do, have it summoned or sneak within 100 feet and hope she
doesn't see you? ;)

Hope that helps!

Talies the Wanderer
